      • Polygon

        public Polygon(java.util.List<java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float> points)

      • Polygon

        public Polygon(java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D rect)
        Builds new polygon object from the specified rectangle.

      • Polygon

        public Polygon(java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Float bounds,
               int factor)
        Build new polygon from ellipse. The ellipse is defined by the specified bounding rectangle. The second parameter specifies how close the polygon approximates the ellipse. Factor of 0 specifies simplest polygon, while factor 100 specifies the most complex polygon.

    • Method Detail

      • intersectSegment

        public PointList intersectSegment(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float a,
                                  java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float b)
        Description copied from class: Polygon
        Calculates the intersections between the polygon and the line segment defined by the given points. The result is a list containing all points of intersection.

      • intersectSegment

        public PointList intersectSegment(com.mindfusion.drawing.Line line)
        Description copied from class: Polygon
        Calculates the intersections between the polygon and the given line segment. The result is a list containing all points of intersection.

                               java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float b)
        Description copied from class: Polygon
        Calculates the intersections between the polygon and the line defined by the given points. The result is a list containing all points of intersection.
